metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7552 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
There is an invalid free in Mapping::DoubleHash::clear in mapping.cpp thatleads to a Segmentation fault in sam2p 0.49.4. A crafted input will lead toa denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sam2p package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.16.04.1').
